title: How much do you make from freelancer websites? - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers in Web Development
Salaries for Specific Jobs and Careers

response.answer_text: How much can you earn by freelancing in a given month? is what you asked and here is my honest response 1 - it all depends on your skill(s) and the amount of time you spend on finding leads, projects and ensuring clients are satisfied. 2 - When I started freelancing 17 years ago, I used to make around 4 to 5000 rs a month, but I never cared or felt low because I gave more importance to learning because the more you learn, the more you can earn then I started freelancing for IT projects around 3 years ago and focused only on specific skills which I was really confident on. Around a year and half ago, I started a Service Development Company and most of the work was coming from Freelancing Portals for quite some time. 3 - if you don’t have any skills that are in demand, you must ask a question such as what skills can I develop to get into freelancing? 4 - do you have the zeal, the drive, the enthusiasm and most importantly self belief to fight it out? if yes, you can get in touch with me and I will give you access to life time membership and support which will be value driven and you will get exclusive access to my life lessons, my skills, my tools I use, my trade secrets on how I make money, ongoing tutorials, articles, ideas, case studies etc I’ve had the opportunity to work with nearly a dozen high-growth startups and world-class experts. What’s more is that I’ve never had to negotiate for the premium prices I charge for my content marketing services. Because I’ve done such an effective job of defining my value propositions, branding myself as an expert within my field, and getting my content in front of new target audiences, I now have a 3–6 month waiting list for new freelance clients. However, that certainly didn’t happen overnight. My rapid success in the world of freelancing is the result of a LOT of strategic positioning, hours of hard work, and good timing. If you’re ready to get serious about freelancing and multiplying your self-employed income, here are my top twelve tips for earning more during your first year. To conclude, although I hate disclosing what I earn, to give you an idea, I am able to take care of my family, my own expenses, my investments and on top of that have some long term liquidity. you can feel free to contact IIMSKILLS by visiting their site and Learn Freelancing.

Freelancing is a very subjective career. It completely depends upon which field you choose to freelance in. Like there are so many options available out there, such as: Digital marketing Blogging Content writing Influencer YouTuber Data Analyst Data entry jobs Web design and development Graphics designing, etc. Actually you have plenty of options here. However, if you are really ambitious and want to go that extra mile, you should really be taking up a topic that would suit your interests and needs. Well, from my personal experience, here I would be talking about the Digital marketing field in particular, owing to my extensive successful experience here. What is digital marketing? Digital marketing is nothing but the online promotional activities performed by the many businesses and organizations to promote their business, their products and services harnessing the best possible digital platforms such as Social media channels, search engines, blogs, websites, etc. Future scope of digital marketing As the online industry is expanding with every passing day, more and more businesses are moving towards the online marketing tactics to reach out to the ever-increasing online population. And thus, this has led to more demands increasing in this field. Currently you will find many aspirants considering digital marketing as their career owing to the best and really interesting options that it offers. These days you must have seen many YouTubers, influencers paving their way through and becoming increasingly famous pertaining to their brilliant content out there. All this is thanks to the digital marketing strategies. Thus, you have a greater scope of making a brilliant career and be successful to a greater extent in this field. However, learning this subject is equally important, to make a great freelancing career and also making a lot of contacts here is important as well. I would highly recommend you attend the free online demo session conducted by the Digital Vidya Institute to learn more about the freelancing career in this field.
